messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Conference Website?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/31/2003 8:28:32 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... A little confusion, it seems. OK. There is a conference in Columbia, South Carolina August
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/31/2003 8:28:32 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
TSUGASKI@... writes:
> Just wondering if there is a site for the MA. Conference coming up in
> August? Would save me from filching through the mountain of posts.
> Thanks!

A little confusion, it seems.

OK. There is a conference in Columbia, South Carolina August 22-24, 2003.
website:

http://schoolsoutsupport.org/2003conference.html

Then Kathryn's taking over for 2004 in MA. I'm sure she'll be plastering the
website as soon as the 2003 conference is over. I just don't think she's quite
that far along yet.

We'd love to see you here in Columbia!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
